title: Straight Ahead Position, Check and Adjust
htmlContent:
Straight Ahead Position, Check and Adjust

When any repair work on the steering gear has been completed, the straight ahead steering position must be checked. The steering is in the straight ahead position if the folding covers are sitting free of strain over the length (A) between the grooves of the tie rod and the steering housing, and the wheels are in the straight ahead position. The steering wheel must also be in the straight ahead position at the same time.
